Can Christ be shown to be genuine,..and fit criteria for a Creator? Is there substantiating and propelling evidence for Jesus existence; life, death and resurrection?

post_info.post_title: Christ: real or fake, creator or not.

Is there a forum for silly sermons? That's where you should be posting this. Your topic has nothing to do with either creationism or evolution.

If Jesus is who He says He his, than this is far more than just a religion, He is life. It is vital to heed to the convictions He has placed on our hearts, while seeking for un-prejudice truth. If the true God and only creator can be tested and tryed and remain true, we had better acknowledge Him and submit ourselves as living sacrifices. There is no god or religion that can come out on top of scrutiny other than Jesus Christ and the Trinity. Let us examine His truth, and his creation, and acknowledge the source.
Post it in religion not evolution and creation
